page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS>>>>POST>>>>>
page.content: There are three collections of post made each day.There are also two deliveries made each day. The morning delivery takes 3 hours. The average number of letters posted each day in Malpas is 450.There are three post men in the Malpas area. Before the letters arrive in Malpas they are colected in SHREWSBURY. FACTS>> a postmans ROUND takes 5 hours. >>LETTERS POSTED in MALPAS are sent to WHITCHURCH to be sorted. >>collections are made at: 9.15 a.m. 12.00 noon and 5.30 p.m.. >>The post office supplies: savings stamps, national savings,driving tax discs,and DHSS payments. >> aletter takes 10 days to get to AMERICA 2 days to get to FRANCE and 24 hours to any place in mainland Britain.
